name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by daidai, goocifer, StagnantDisplay, salvagebar, Connellingus, Sprog, tropicana, Audhumla, motts, joamiq, SotiCoto)

name: nutmeg
text: A comment left by nutmeg was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pwb, slysa, Drenmer)

name: steerpike66
text: Don't be ridiculous; there's no such thing as a MIB:II reference.

name: yingkaixing
text: A comment left by yingkaixing was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by 7th_shot, d3lvn, nutmeg)

name: deimosrising
text: ouch

name: semiquaver
text:
You lamed a comment of mine on "Will You Be My Girlfriend Molly" even though I basically pointed out that to lame it would be extremely silly/tacky. Not making any accusations here, just pointing out out.

I just tracked down a man on Internet. What a strange feeling. *shudders* I am so sorry. I do not even know why I am doing this.

name: rowboat
text: I've noticed that, statistically speaking, deimosrising is the anti-asherdan. Either of them can write anything and reasonably expect to garner inordinate amounts of chubbies and lames, respectively. This is a thing I noticed.

name: semiquaver
text: You're pretty much right on the money there.  Not that I would call asherdan getting lamed for every damn comment unfair in any way.  Man's got a history.  Ain't nobody stuck up for him and felt good about it later.

name: rowboat
text: I speak not of fair and unfair, but only of what is.

name: semiquaver
text: Man "inordinate" is a word that makes a value judgment don't you know

name: rowboat
text: I guess that checks out. OK, by "inordinate amounts of" I meant "hell of." Better?

name: charchar
text: It can occasionally.  Sometimes it also means "a hell of X that is unnecessary" Example: The inordinate amounts of yellin' ruined the otherwise lovely sex.(Sorry, ex-Spelling Team Captain).

name: gunsofray
text: A comment left by gunsofray was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by logic, ASaltySalute4, usversusthem)

name: rowboat
text: There's this great comic you should read called Achewood.

name: gunsofray
text: Yeah..I.. What? I though 'hella' was used more than 'hell of' with the exception of Roast Beef.. unless you're referring to the amount of strips i've read, in which case i can only really.. Do nothing.

name: rowboat
text: All I'm saying is that "hell of" is quite common in this place. It is a Thing.

name: gunsofray
text: My mind is blown.

name: semiquaver
text: I keep looking at your icon and seeing Spongebob.  Somehow, the exquisite sadness of a green Spongebob with the caption "All my friends are dead" is almost irresistable to the eye.

name: gunsofray
text: all this time, i've been glancing at it and seeing Spongebob. My mind is blown. Again.

name: rowboat
text: Try as I may, I still cannot see Spongebob in my avatar. Maybe I need to unfocus or something.

name: gunsofray
text: I sort of see it while reading your comments, out of the corner of my eye. Even when i know it is not Spongebob, i see Spongebob. Do I need an eye examination? Probably.

name: rowboat
text: Yours is Giger, right? Dicks goin' into asses. Asses lookin' like Alien heads.

name: gunsofray
text: I wanted a controversial (badly spelled?) avatar, and i'm a fan of  <strike>penises</strike>  the Dead Kennedys, and i saw that Roast Beef was too .. i didn't know the artist untill you said the name just now, so have a chubby, sir. Also; yes. I find it creepy how none of the asses have legs attached, and the penises arent connected to anyone.. Unless its a huge pile-up of horny legless men, that is ..

name: mashisoyo
text: Holy shit! That's not a green Spongebob!

name: saucy_jack
text: A comment left by saucy_jack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by trialandterror, The_Dude, gardenhead_, pogo)

text: same

text:
Quote:
even though I basically pointed out that to lame it would be extremely silly/tacky.

ahahahaha jesus christ

name: catachresis
text: All about panel 4. Are you listening, 8 Mile?

name: catachresis
text: "aww!"

name: geysershitdick
text: We all gotta chug that drink made out of wrung out Wet-Naps sometime.

name: saint
text: it is the drink of humility.

name: spinynorman
text: Fuck wormwood.

name: boredom_man
text: In libertine Paris, wormwood fucks you.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: In Soviet Ukraine, Chernobyl means wormwood.

name: invidious
text: It's called "Thunderbird" and you can pick it up at any liquor store.

name: tekende
text:
I remember now
I remember now
Why they called it Thunderbird

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Panel five, man. Panel five fucking flows.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Seriously. The cruelest cut of all. (Best rhyme in achewood history?)

name: paco
text: What's amazing here is how Onstad must have felt writing these rhymes. Like, when you come up with a good one, its just soo great, and here he comes up with a million.

name: delzhand
text: This is another of those "laugh so loud you almost get fired" strips.  Which is compounded by the fact that I kept re-reading it.

name: howard
text: Ray got hell of flow.

name: thicker
text: When you feel so bad for your opponent that you throw a little "aww" in on the side, you know you've got the battle won.

name: m1st3rbl4ck
text: Fighting rats with a rake.

name: hellaedgar
text:
Popov vodka = a disaster.

Good times.

name: greyfield
text: Calling someone a warm Popov martini is the greatest of insults, right up there with comparing them to Paris Hilton.

name: epicurus
text: Ray has still got that mad flow. Little Nephew played with the fire that is Ray and got BURNED.

name: darkwaffle
text:
Think about it, who are the 5 best rappers ever? Smuckles..smuckles...smuckles smuckles and smuckles

Because he spits hot fire!

name: slab64
text: And he's no sugar-cookie-getter

name: ford
text: *punch* you're too close man!

name: neoboman
text: Lil Nephew, if you can't take the heat, get out of the kitchen.

text: this was a good arc.

text: Using the isoceles lock.

name: swatson
text: I am so sorry. So very sorry. I really ment to hit lame. My laptop mouse pad is a sad thing.

name: stuart
text:
This is to rap battles what fatalities are to Mortal Kombat.

FINISH HIM

name: erinye
text:
Uh, I think we can already claim:

FATALITY

name: stuart
text: or possibly BABALITY

name: soticoto
text:
Followed by VICTOLY ...

... Wait... we allowed to splice in Samurai Shodown?

name: rowboat
text: Ya'll some nerds.

name: myrrdisparo
text: Well, they DO read Achewood

name: skiddyfisk
text: Ray may be a dense fellow, but he can LAY IT DOWN.

name: tragicone
text: little nephew got cut up like an emo kid

name: incendiary
text:
"You get kidnapped at Binion's and sold as prime rib!"

Those words sting even me. Best strip ever.

name: endoftheworld
text: Check Ray's expression in the last panel. He knows that no matter how obnoxious your teenaged nephew behaves, some rhymes are just TOO FRESH to be used on anyone younger than seventeen. Rap responsibly.

name: straw
theguitarhero
text:
The last panel just sold me on this comic, even though I've been reading the archives for three days and loved everything.

To go from super-angry to super-mad is so hilarious.

name: echidnaboy
text: Jeez Ray, go easy on the kid. Increase the peace!

name: contrasoma
text: LN got himself Ethered .

name: professorhazard
text:
I'm mackin' it pimp-like all smooth as the Dickens
You're shipped off to Cuba to help crate up chickens

I head up to the suite to cold get my Bone on
You're cryin' and tryin' to switch a pay phone on
Broken glass booth all looks like it's been stoned on

text: There's nothing to "get."  Inside that little cube...he's hollow.  *plonk*

name: vice
text:
FINISH HIM!


FATALITY!

name: sp1derbaby
text: But Ray's already ripped out his little heart :-(

name: meowmix
text: ooooh snap! that is some serious buuuuuurn bein' dealt out.

name: justa
text: Little Nephew lost his best friend to a gang of roving prime-rib kidnappers. Ray doesn't know the boy's got that as a history.

name: snowman
text: Okay, I said how I didn't like these rap-off strips.  I take it back.  This one is awesome.  Maybe I was just uncomfortable seeing Ray losing.

name: tekende
text:
RAY SMUCKLES

HIS RHYMES ARE SO HARD CHILDREN CRY

name: mr_lostman28
text:
I can't wait til I get to hear someone say this on an MTV raps ad.
Instead of selling a rapper as "He's so hardcore from the streets, he been shot nine times!"
with "He's so stone cold with his flow, its like momma's backhand to your face!"

name: bpmead
text: Ray's rhymes are obviously tight but his flow is questionable.

name: desert_donkey
text: Binion's. lols. that place is rather ghetto. still the best gambling joint in vegass.

name: ctrl_z
text: Served! Served! Served! Served! ...

name: zapatos
text: Honestly, LN kinda asked for it.

name: carlyle
text: LN just got utterly destroyed. Is this how Ray got him to stop rapping?

name: greenkoolayd
text: if you wanna play with a big dogg(cat), you might get bit.

name: tragicone
text: now that I look at this again, I am not sure whether in the last panel ray looks concerned or whether he is like "oh snaps. I got this boy cryin"

name: rowboat
text: I always saw it as "Oh, shit. What have I done? I've gone too far." He just got lost in the battle and forgot that he was just dueling a kid and ended up bringin' it too hard.
